title: Information We Collect
description: 1.1 Personal Information: We collect personal information, including name, email address, phone number, and billing information, when you register for courses, contact us, or make a purchase.
1.2. Usage Information: We may collect information about your use of our website and services, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and browsing history.

1.3. Cookies: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your experience on our website and gather information about your browsing and usage habits. Your browser's settings allow you to manage your cookie options.

desTitle: We may use your personal information in the following ways:
title: How We Use Your Information
description: - To offer and deliver our courses and services to you.
- To communicate with you about your course enrollment and changes
- To answer your inquiries and offer customer assistance
- Send you promotional and marketing information as permitted by law.
- We want to improve our website, services, and user experience.

title: Security
description: We respect your trust in supplying us with your Personal Information, thus we strive to preserve it in a commercially acceptable manner. However, no technique of internet transmission or electronic storage is completely secure and trustworthy, and we cannot guarantee its perfect security.

title: Children's Privacy
description: Our website and services are not intended for people under the age of 15. We do not deliberately gather personal information from children.

title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
description: We may periodically amend our Privacy Policy. As a result, it is recommended that you check this website on a regular basis for updates. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on this page. These modifications become effective immediately once they are posted on this page.

title: Links to other websites
description: This Service may contain connections to other websites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be taken to that website. It should be noted that we do not own or operate these external websites. As a result, we strongly suggest you study the privacy policies of these websites. We have no control over, and accept no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party websites or services.
